name: Computeroid
description:
Computeroid — Crash the Computer

A top-down puzzle game with a retro computer theme.

  • 13 engaging puzzle levels
  • 6 colors to discover
  • 4 custom soundtracks
  • 1 goal — crash the computer in a variety of creative ways

Created by duo Cooper Saye and Alexander Tamura.

Find the soundtrack on spotify:

https://open.spotify.com/album/4PZGIQn6qd0NyzI9eiramt

Special thanks to:

  • Ryan
  • Zak
  • Lukas
  • Marco
